note: Avid THFC fan, proud Essex boy, husband, dad & granddad. Hate Tories, love the ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡º. No DM's or advertising

name: Work
value: Worked in IT for 33 years until I got tired of living out of a suitcase. Worked in Brussels, Dublin, Amersfoort and Paris as well as various points around the UK. Having worked in Europe I knew we were wrong in voting to come out.

name: Other stuff
value: Hate the Tories and my dad would spin in his grave if he ever thought I have, or would, vote for them. Will fight to rejoin the EU and to #GTTO

name: My love
value: Not the wife but Tottenham Hotspur FC. Have a ST in the North Stand and get to as many games as I can but it is getting more expensive. Educated my two Grandson's into being Spurs fans but I am beginning to feel that I am a wicked Granddad.

name: My purpose in life
value: In 1975 I was sent north to do missionary work in Yorkshire to educate these lovely people. Was expected to return to Essex but it has taken longer than expected ðŸ˜‰
